author: jstrachan
msg: new JellyUnit test cases for the <define:script> and <define:invoke> tags

author: jstrachan
msg: added an <define:invoke script="${foo}"> tag that allows easy invoking of scripts defined using <define:script var="foo">...</define:script>
This makes it very easy to define blocks of Jelly scripts then invoke them on demand. This can be handy for parameterizing Jelly scripts.
Also patched some of the javadoc documentation for this tag library

author: jstrachan
msg: Patched the <assert> tag so that <assert xpath="$doc/foo/bar"/> along with relative XPath assertions, like
now work fine. Also added unit test cases for these things finally

author: jstrachan
msg: used latest dom4j build which fixes the <x:if test=""> and <assert xpath=""/> use cases due to an old Jaxen bug with boolean evaluations of XPath expressions.

author: jstrachan
msg: added more descriptive failure exceptions when assertions fail if there is no comment
